intro.p: Create a polynomial in simplest terms (i.e. only one term of any given power) that meets the following conditions.

item.p: Has at least five terms with non-zero coefficients.
Uses at least two positive numbers as coefficients and at least two negative numbers as coefficients.
Uses at least one rational number between {{low}} and {{high}} that is not an integer.

intro.p: Write your polynomial below and answer the following questions about your polynomial.

content.p: What is the degree of your polynomial?
What is the value of the constant term?
What is the coefficient of the linear term?
What is the coefficient of the second highest degree term?
